DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare Efficacy Safety Between Holmium Laser Enucleation Prostate ( HoLEP ) Transurethral Resection Prostate ( TURP ) Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms ( LUTS ) Secondary Benign Prostate Hyperplasia ( BPH ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study HoLEP TURP LUTS Secondary BPH
DOC.criteria: 50 yr great International prostatic symptom score > = 12 Bladder outlet obstruction confirm pressureflow study ( BOOI > 20 ) Able give fully inform consent Patients urologic malignancy prostate cancer bladder cancer Patients underwent urethral , prostate surgery Patients urethral stricture bladder diverticulum bladder neck contracture Patients histories bacterial prostatitis within 1 year seem appropriate study decision investigator reason
